animeDescription: In an alternate take of the final battle of episode 7 of Mobile Suit Gundam Unicorn, Banagher Links in the RX-0 Unicorn Gundam Perfectibility sorties from the Nahel Argama to confront Full Frontal in his NZ-999 Neo Zeong.  Mobile Suit Gundam Unicorn Perfectibility is a short WALL-G movie projected alongside The Life-Sized Unicorn Gundam Statue at Diver City Tokyo Plazaâ€™s Festival Plaza in Odaiba, Tokyo.  (Source: Gundam Wiki)
